title: Raspberry Pi 5 Model 8GB RAM
description: Greetings, Raspberry Pi enthusiasts! It’s official—the Raspberry Pi 5 has arrived Welcome to the cutting-edge Raspberry Pi 5 Model 8GB RAM, the latest generation of this iconic computing marvel. Packed with a 64-bit quad-core Arm Cortex-A76 processor clocked at 2.4GHz, the Raspberry Pi 5 boasts an impressive 2–3× increase in CPU performance compared to its predecessor, the Raspberry Pi 4.

reviews.name: Aditya
reviews.text: Good But stopped working after 3 days

title: Raspberry PI RP2040 Microcontroller IC REEL of 100
description: RP2040 Microcontroller IC by Raspberry PI-REEL of 100 It brings our signature values of high performance, low cost, and ease of use to the microcontroller space. With a large on-chip memory, symmetric dual-core processor complex, deterministic bus fabric, and rich peripheral set augmented with our unique Programmable I/O (PIO) subsystem, it provides professional users with unrivaled power and flexibility.

title: Mastech MS830N / MS830L+(2000 Counts) Manual Ranging Digital Multimeter
description: Mastech MS830N / MS830L+(2000 Counts) Manual Ranging Digital Multimeter is featuring a 2000-count display, the Mastech MS830N ensures precise and clear readings for essential electrical measurements, including voltage, current, and resistance. The manual-ranging capability allows users to manually select the appropriate measurement range, offering flexibility and control over the testing process.

title: LM2596S DC-DC Buck Converter Power Supply
description: DC-DC Buck Converter Step Down Module LM2596 Power Supply is a step-down(buck) switching regulator, capable of driving a 3-A load with excellent line and load regulation. These devices are available in fixed output voltages of 3.3 V, 5 V, 12 V, and an adjustable output version.The LM2596 series operates at a switching frequency of 150kHz, thus allowing smaller sized filter components than what would be required with lower frequency switching regulators.

title: LM2596S DC-DC Buck Converter Power Supply
description: 8 Pin IC Socket base adaptor is an 8 pin IC holder, which can be soldered directly onto the PCB. The IC can be removed from this socket when required. The IC is placed on the socket at the time of use. This base acts as a removable IC holder.The socket is used when the IC is temperature sensitive and the heat from the soldering iron can damage the IC. This socket is used when working with a microcontroller IC and can be removed for programming.

title: Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W
description: As u know the Raspberry Pi Zero W has been well performed and done its trade to enhance this the Raspberry has launched the brand new Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W which is the newest version to prior. Day by Day raspberry pi has reduced its dimensions with flawless technology into it this time the RPI Zero 2 W comes with a size of only 65mm long by 30mm wide and at a very economical price. With the addition of wireless LAN and Bluetooth, the Raspberry Pi Zero W2 is ideal for making embedded Internet of Things (IoT) projects. The Pi Zero W2 has been designed to be as flexible and compact as possible with mini connectors and an unpopulated 40-pin GPIO, allowing you to use only what your project requires.

title: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B with 4GB RAM
description: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B with 4GB RAM is the latest product in the popular Raspberry Pi range of computers. It offers ground-breaking increases in processor speed, multimedia performance, memory; and connectivity compared to the prior-generation Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ while retaining backward compatibility and similar power consumption. For the end-user, Raspberry Pi 4 Model B provides desktop performance comparable to entry-level x86 PC systems.

title: 1.5F – 5.5V – Super Capacitor
description: Super capacitors are perfect for applications where the capacity of a standard electrolytic capacitor is too small and a rechargeable battery is bigger than needed. This 1.5F capacitor will run an LED / Arduino board for 15-20mins

title: 1.5F – 6V – Super Capacitor
description: Super capacitors are perfect for applications where the capacity of a standard electrolytic capacitor is too small and a rechargeable battery is bigger than needed. The 1.5 Farad, 6 Volt Super Capacitor is a high-performance energy storage component designed to bridge the gap between traditional electrolytic capacitors and rechargeable batteries. Built for applications requiring rapid charge and discharge cycles, this super capacitor delivers reliable short-term power with exceptional efficiency and durability.

title: Teensy 4.1 Development Board
description: Here’s Teensy 4.1 Development Board. The Teensy 4.1 is the newest iteration of the astoundingly popular development platform that features an ARM Cortex-M7 processor at 600MHz, with an NXP iMXRT1062 chip, four times larger flash memory than the 4.0, and two new locations to optionally add more memory. The Teensy 4.1 is the same size and shape as the Teensy 3.6 (2.4in by 0.7in) and provides greater I/O capability, including an ethernet PHY, SD card socket, and USB host port.

title: Cytron 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit SK40C
description: This is Cytron 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit SK40C. The SK40C (new version of SK40B) is a 40pin PIC microcontroller starter kit designed to offer an easy-to-start solution for PIC microcontroller user. This board comes with the basic element for the user to begin project development. It offers plug and use features.

title: 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A
description: This is 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A. The SKds40A is designed to support Microchip  40-pin dsPIC MCU. It supports dsPIC30F3011, 4011, 3014, 4013.

title: CIKU PIC PIC18F4550 based Arduino form factor starter kit
description: This is 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A. The SKds40A is designed to support Microchip  40-pin dsPIC MCU. It supports dsPIC30F3011, 4011, 3014, 4013.

title: 650nm 6mm 5V DC 5mW Mini Laser Dot Diode Module
description: 650nm 6mm 5V DC 5mW Mini Laser Dot Diode Module which is made of copper plastic. It is suitable for 3V 5mW standard, with 6mm outside diameter, can be used to connect diode tubes for multiple uses.

title: Laser Module 650NM 5V
description: The LASER MODULE 650NM 5V head is composed of a light-emitting tube, condenser lens, and adjustable copper sleeve and it is assembled when delivered, the focal length of the lens is adjusted glued by strong glue stick, which can work directly after connecting to a 5V DC power supply.

title: Teensy 4.0 Development Board with Headers
description: The Teensy 4.0 with Headers is a compact yet incredibly powerful development board featuring a 600MHz ARM Cortex-M7 processor. Pre-soldered headers mean no hassle—just plug in and start building. Despite its tiny 1.4″ x 0.7″ footprint, this board delivers serious performance for real-time computing, audio, and high-speed interfaces.

title: Waveshare Luckfox Pico Mini A RV1103 Linux Micro Development Board, Integrates ARM Cortex-A7/RISC-V MCU/NPU/ISP Processors
description: The integration of diverse processors, including the ARM Cortex-A7, RISC-V MCU, NPU, and ISP, makes this board versatile for a range of applications requiring varied computational capabilities. Developers can leverage these components to build solutions that involve machine learning, image processing, IoT, and other embedded applications.

title: Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam
description: The Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam has Crisp HD 720p/30 fps video calls with diagonal 55° field of  view and auto light correction. This Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam is Compatible with popular platforms including Skype and Zoom. The Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam is  built-in noise-reducing mic makes sure your voice comes across clearly up to 1.5 meters away, even if you’re in busy surroundings. C270’s Right Light 2 feature adjusts to lighting conditions, producing brighter, contrasted images to help you look good in all your conference calls.

title: Elecrow CrowView Note-All-in-One Portable Monitor, Phone-to-Laptop Device With Full-Featured Type-C
description: we designed the Elecrow CrowView Note-All-in-One Portable Monitor , empowering all your devices as laptops. This Elecrow CrowView Note all-in-one portable monitor is compatible with smartphones, single-board computers such as Raspberry Pi 5 and Jetson Nano, mini PCs, and gaming consoles. It provides a clean, organized workspace, enhancing your productivity anywhere.

title: Olimex Duinomite-Mini PIC32MX795 PIC 32Bit
description: The Olimex Duinomite-mini Pic32MX795 Pic 32Bit is a Maximite Compatible Basic computer, originally designed by Geoff Graham, with additional features. DuinoMite allows you to program in BASIC language and have VGA and Keyboard interface, so you can develop and write your code in Basic without the need of any computer.

title: STMICROELECTRONICS NUCLEO-G071RB Development Board ,Nucleo-64, 32-Bit, STM32G071RB MCU
description: The STM Nucleo Development Board, STMICROELECTRONICS NUCLEO-G071RB – STM32 Nucleo-64 STM32G071RB Development Board boards provide an affordable and flexible way for users to try out new concepts and build prototypes with the STM32 microcontroller, which provide various combinations of performance, power consumption and features. do not require any separate probe, as it integrates the ST-LINK/V2-1 debugger/programmer. The STM32 Nucleo-64 boards come with the comprehensive free STM32 software libraries and examples that are available with the STM32Cube package.

title: 3.5″ inch ILI9486 TFT LCD Module 480×320 for Arduino Uno without Stylus
description: 3.5″ inch ILI9486 TFT  LCD Module 480×320 for Arduino Uno without Stylus is a compact yet powerful display solution designed specifically for Arduino Uno boards. With a high-resolution 480×320 screen, it offers crisp and clear visuals for your projects. This module boasts compatibility with Arduino Uno, making it easy to integrate into your existing projects. Whether you’re building a smart home dashboard, a portable gaming device, or an interactive art installation, this LCD Module provides a vibrant canvas for your creativity.

title: 4D Systems 3.2″ LCD module with Arduino Adaptor Shield and Cable uLCD-32PTU-AR
description: The 4D Arduino Adaptor Shield (Rev 2.0) is designed to seamlessly connect 4D Systems display modules to Arduino boards, eliminating the need for jumper wires. Compatible with gen4 displays like the gen4-uLCD-24DT and gen4-uLCD-43DT, it facilitates easy integration into projects. The included 4DLCD-32QA is a 3.2” TFT display with a resolution of 240×320 pixels, offering 65K colors, a brightness of 200 cd/m², and a contrast ratio of 350:1. With a 4-wire resistive touch screen and a 40-pin FPC interface, LCD module with Arduino Adapter Shield is perfect for enhancing Arduino projects that require a graphical display.

title: Micro USB-A to Micro-B Cable 100cm Data & Power Cable
description: The Micro USB-A to Micro-B Cable is a durable and reliable data and charging cable designed for a wide range of electronic devices. With a length of 100cm, it offers flexibility and convenience for connecting devices at a comfortable distance. The cable supports both data transfer and power delivery, making it suitable for smartphones, tablets, development boards, cameras, and other USB-enabled devices.

title: Official Arduino Edge Control AKX00034
description: The Official Arduino Edge Control can be positioned anywhere and is suitable for precision farming, smart agriculture, and other applications requiring intelligent control in remote locations. Power can be either supplied via solar panel or DC input.

title: SmartElex 16-Channel Analog/Digital MUX Breakout Board – CD74HC4067 (Pack of 2)
description: The SmartElex Analog/Digital MUX Breakout is a compact and smart board that brings huge flexibility to your circuits. With this Analog/Digital MUX Breakout, you can switch one signal line among 16 different channels - perfect when you want to read many sensors without using lots of pins. Built around the reliable CD74HC4067 chip, this 16-Channel MUX Breakout makes your work easier: whether you're dealing with analog signals like temperature sensors or digital signals like buttons and switches, it handles both. With just a few control lines, you can pick which channel to connect. Ideal for hobbyists, makers, and DIY electronics enthusiasts, this multiplexer module gives you room to expand without complexity. Simply plug it in, connect a few wires, and free up your microcontroller’s pins for other tasks - making your project cleaner and smarter.

title: ATSAMA5D27-SOM1
description: The module is built around the ATSAMA5D27C-D1G-CU, which is a 'System in Package' (SiP) that combines the microprocessor with DDR2 memory.

title: OSD3358-512M-ISM
description: The OSD3358-512M-ISM is a high-performance System-in-Package (SiP) from Octavo Systems. It is a more powerful alternative to the SAMA5D27-SOM1 you previously looked at, integrating a full Linux-ready computer—including the processor, RAM, and power management—into a single BGA package.

title: 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit Combo 2 SK40C + PIC18F4550 (SK40C2)
description: This is 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit Combo 2 SK40C + PIC18F4550 (SK40C2). The SK40C (new version of SK40B) is a 40pin PIC microcontroller starter kit designed to offer an easy-to-start solution for PIC microcontroller user. This board comes with the basic element for the user to begin project development. It offers plug and use features.

title: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit
description: An exclusive Starter Kit from Robu.in that includes the fastest model of the Raspberry Pi family – The Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ and everything you need to get up and running.The raspberry pi 3 b+ kit is the most popular board featuring a 64-bit quad-core processor running at 1.4 GHz. It incorporates enhanced built-in dual-band WiFi (2.4 GHz and 5 GHz), Bluetooth 4.2/BLE, and faster Ethernet. Also included in this Raspberry Pi 3 Starter Kit is a premium Raspberry Pi 3 case, a 32 GB Class 10 MicroSD Card.The 5V,3 A Micro USB power supply is specially designed and tested for the Raspberry Pi 3 B+. The high-Quality 50cm HDMI to HDMI cable made up of Copper will give seamless connectivity with the Display. RJ45 Ethernet patch LAN cable with gold-plated connectors will give a high-speed LAN connection to your Board Get it and kick start your journey with Raspberry Pi.

title: Quantum Tiny Linux Development Kit – With SoM and Expansion Board
description: Quantum Tiny Linux Development Kit – With SoM and Expansion BoardQuantum Tiny Linux Development Kit consists of a core board which is the SoM (System on Module) and an expansion board as the carrier board.The SoM, Quark-N, is based on Allwinner H3, Quad-core Cortex-A7, and ARM Mali400 MP2 GPU. The carrier board, Atom-N, leads out a row of golden finger pins to realize I/O expansion, expand SPI, I2C, UART, GPIO, and other useful interfaces.The kit may be the smallest Linux development board on the market which is suitable for scenarios such as a personal server, intelligent voice assistant, and robotic development.

title: EK-TM4C123GXL
description: The EK-TM4C123GXL, also known as the Tiva C Series LaunchPad, is a low-cost evaluation platform from Texas Instruments for the ARM Cortex-M4F-based microcontroller. It is widely used in engineering education and for prototyping high-performance embedded systems.

title: X-NUCLEO-GNSS1A1
description: The X-NUCLEO-GNSS1A1 is a specialized expansion board from STMicroelectronics designed to add high-performance satellite positioning capabilities to STM32 Nucleo development boards. It is built around the Teseo-LIV3F tiny GNSS module.

title: SmartElex ATmega2560 Development Board with LCD1602 LCD Display-Upgraded
description: SmartElex ATMEGA2560 Development Board is a powerful development platform based on ATMEGA2560 microcontroller which is one of the most feature-rich AVR microcontrollers from Atmel, featuring 256K Flash, 8K RAM, 86 I/O lines arranged in nine 8 bit ports, 16 ADCs, 4 UARTs, 6 timers, 8 interrupts and much more. This board is ideal for developing embedded applications involving high-speed wireless communication, USB-based data logging, real-time data monitoring, and control etc.

title: ESP-01 ESP8266 Serial WIFI Wireless Transceiver Module
description: The ESP-01 ESP8266 Serial WIFI Wireless Transceiver Module is a self-contained SOC with integrated TCP/IP protocol stack that can give any microcontroller access to your WiFi network. The ESP8266 is capable of either hosting an application or offloading all Wi-Fi networking functions from another application processor.

title: ESPresso Lite V2.0 ESP8266, Espressif, IoT, wifi
description: The ESPresso Lite V2.0 ESP8266 is the first low-cost Arduino-compatible ESP8266 WiFi development board manufactured by Malaysia. Working together with experts, a Singapore IoT technology company, this board allows anyone to learn, experiment and build their IoT projects easily and quickly.

title: ESPresso Lite V2.0 IoT Starter Kit ESP8266, Espressif IoT WiFi
description: The ESPresso Lite V2.0 IoT Starter Kit is an all-in-one educational bundle designed for beginners and developers to quickly prototype connected devices. Unlike the standalone board, the Starter Kit specifically includes the necessary sensors and debugging tools to build a functional IoT node out of the box.

title: Micro SD Card Reader Module
description: Add the desired memory to your Arduino project to store the data, Media etc. Micro SD Card Reader Module also called Micro SD Adaptor which is designed for dual I/O voltages. The Module is a simple solution for transferring data to and from a standard SD card. The pinout is directly compatible with Not only with Arduino as shown in the diagram in below, but can also be used with other microcontrollers. Micro SD Card Reader Module has an SPI interface which is compatible with any sd card and it uses 5V or 3.3V power supply which is compatible with Arduino UNO/Mega.SD module has various applications such as data logger, audio, video, graphics.

title: MCU-Micro USB Breadboard 5V Power Supply Module
description: MCU-Micro USB Breadboard 5V Power Supply Module 5Pin Female Connector B type PCB Converter. This breakout board is great for interfacing USB Signals with your custom designed microcontroller boards. It also is useful if all you want is access to 5V USB power for your prototype circuits such as breadboards, perforated boards or Vero boards.Pinouts:VCC: 5V Power SupplyD- : USB D- SignalD+: USB D+ SignalID: USB Identifier Signal for OTG DevicesGND: Power Ground

title: Male to Female Jumper Wires 40 Pin 30cm
description: This is Male to Female Jumper Wires 40 Pin 30cm. A very Flexible and easily detachable cable to the no. of wires according to your requirement. It has 1Pin male to the 1pin female header with both ends. Also, it is compatible with 2.54 mm mil spacing pin headers.

title: ProMicro RP2040 Blackboard Proxy
description: The ProMicro RP2040 Blackboard Proxy is a high-performance, ultra-compact development board that adapts the powerful Raspberry Pi RP2040 chip into the classic "Pro Micro" footprint.

title: Microsoft’s Azure Sphere MT3620 Starter Kit
description: Microsoft’s Azure Sphere MT3620 Starter Kit supports rapid prototyping of highly secure, end-to-end IoT implementations using Microsoft’s Azure Sphere. The small form-factor carrier board includes a production-ready MT3620 Sphere module with Wi-Fi connectivity, along with multiple expansion interfaces for easy integration of sensors, displays, motors, relays, and more.This Starter Kit highlights Avnet’s certified, production-ready Sphere MT3620 module which is based on the highly integrated MediaTek MT3620AN tri-core Wi-Fi SoC device. Embedded user applications targeting it’s 500 MHz ARM Cortex-A7 application processor are built and debugged using Microsoft’s popular Visual Studio IDE.

title: Sipeed Maixduino for RISC-V AI + IoT
description: Based on MAIX Module, the Maixduino is a RISC-V 64 development board for AI + IoT applications. Different with other Sipeed MAIX dev. boards, Maixduino was designed in an Arduino Uno form factor, with the ESP32 module on board together with the MAIX AI module.

title: LILYGO T-Display 4MB ESP32 WiFi Bluetooth Development Board
description: This is LILYGO board is based on the ESP32-D0WDQ6 Wifi Module comes with a built-in 1.14inch display and also it has an onboard battery connector and battery management system. The board has an onboard USB Type – C connector which can be used to provide power and to upload code to the ESP32.Features:Easy to UseLOW Energy ConsumptionWide ApplicationLong Life

title: Pycom WiPy 2.0 WiFi-Bluetooth IOT Development Board
description: Introducing WiPy 2.0. The tiny MicroPython enabled Wifi & Bluetooth IoT development platform. With a 1KM WiFi range, state of the art Espressif ESP32 chipset and dual processor, the WiPy is all about taking the Internet of Things to the next level. Create and connect your things everywhere.

title: NANO32 ESP32 IoT Development Board
description: The NANO32 ESP32 IoT Development Board is the product by the designers of Arduino Nano and Espresso Lite (Thailand-based Gravitech and MakerAsia respectively) is the first third-party development board that provides another alternative to the eager-beavers community of geeks, makers, hackers and developers interested in the latest Wi-Fi/BT combo ‘wonder’ chip.

title: ESP8266 Serial Port To Wi-Fi Module, FL-M1S
description: This ESP8266 Serial Port To Wi-Fi Module, FL-M1S  serial transceiver module, based on ESP8266 SoC with an integrated TCP/IP protocol stack It can either host the application or offload all Wi-Fi networking functions from another application processor.ESP8266 has powerful onboard processing and storage capabilities allowing it to integrate with sensors and other devices through GPIOs with minimal development up-front and minimal loading during runtime.

title: Uno R3 Board without Cable compatible with Arduino
description: Uno R3 is one of the widely used and accepted module for prototyping. It has huge user community worldwide. Uno R3 SMD module is based on the Atmega328p-AU MCU of Atmel AVR Family. It is a 8 Bit Microcontroller. This is an entry level development board. But, is not a basic one, it packs 32 KB Flash, 2 KB RAM, and 1 KB of EEPROM.

title: Data Logger module Logging Shield data Recorder Shield
description: Here’s a handy Arduino shield we’ve had a lot of people looking for a dedicated and well-designed data logging shield. We worked hard to engineer an inexpensive but well-rounded design. Not only is it easy to assemble and customize. The Data Logger module Logging Shield data Recorder Shield also comes with great documentation and libraries.

title: UNO Proto Shield prototype expansion board with SYB-170 mini breadboard
description: Used in conjunction with the Arduino UNO Proto Shield prototype expansion board, used to build prototype circuits can be directly soldered components on the board, you can also connect the circuit through the above mini breadboard. Between breadboard and the board through the double-sided adhesive connection, when sold breadboard and the board are separate.
